markdownRemark.html:
Wanting an opportune moment,
One that seems it may never come,
Having well placed flowers and wine,
All most perfect in its design,

Ode to a romantic notion,
Hopes that have no comparison,
Moments pass and nothing is done,
Now hearts mayn't ever be won,

Romantic words and intentions,
Choice scripting of interactions,
Enter one prince out horse riding,
And a nature loving maiden,

Slaved by a deep seated craving,
Our carnal demands for actions,
Now anxious for what's to happen,
Patient for a happy ending.

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Wanting an opportune moment,  
One that seems it may never come,  
Having well placed flowers and wine,  
All most perfect in its design,  

Ode to a romantic notion,  
Hopes that have no comparison,  
Moments pass and nothing is done,  
Now hearts mayn't ever be won,  

Romantic words and intentions,  
Choice scripting of interactions,  
Enter one prince out horse riding,  
And a nature loving maiden,  

Slaved by a deep seated craving,  
Our carnal demands for actions,  
Now anxious for what's to happen,  
Patient for a happy ending.
